subject: Re: [junit] Best practices [Topic]
msgSnippet: ... and people with different point of views trying to expose or impose their ideas.  I think it s a great tool and hope that people will be responsible and
messageBody:
> Is it possible for people to just submit request, so that we won't overwrite
> each other's change? I can see that this will become a hot topic and there
> will be cases that several people changing it at the same time.

and people with different point of views trying to expose "or impose" their ideas. I think it's a great tool and hope that people will be responsible and not screw up everything.

So let's give it a try and see the result in a couple of weeks.

-Vladimir
